content: snow day neck gaiter this is a tighter lighter possibly more manly version of the snow day cowl recipe take a skein of heavy worsted yarn about 120 yards needed such as malabrigio worsted & circular 6mm needles i used symfoni love garn and just needed to start a second skein to get the depth i required which was 10 inches cast on 72 stitches & join knit a row purl a row knit a row purl a row to give a garter stitch edge i knit 3 row of each to give three garter stitch bumps change to garter stitch rib i e 1 row k2 p2 & then 1 row all knit continue until cowl is almost the required length repeat garter stitch edge & bind off loosely serve with a good warm jacket & stay toasty warm the finished gaiter has a circumference of 22 inches giving a closer fit but not too close for a turtle or polo type fit either use 5mm needles or cast on 68 stitches
